trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 関連付けられている表しますオーディオの入力は、 <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 音声認識エンジンには、認識操作の一環としてオーディオ入力に関する情報が生成されます。

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: 認識されているオーディオにアクセスするに使用して、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>プロパティまたは<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A><xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>メソッド</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes: - Events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - Methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> > [!IMPORTANT] > A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: によって、次のイベントとメソッドの認識の結果を生成することができます、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>と<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>クラス:-イベント:-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>と<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>と<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>と<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>と<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>-メソッド:-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>と<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>と<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>> [!IMPORTANT] > A 認識エミュー レートされた音声認識によって生成される結果に認識されているオーディオが含まれていません</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>。

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: このような認識結果では、その<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>プロパティから返される`null`とその<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>メソッドが例外をスローします</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: エミュレートされた音声認識機能の詳細については、次を参照してください、`EmulateRecognize`と`EmulateRecognizeAsync`のメソッド、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>と<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>クラス。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 開始時に認識されているオーディオの入力オーディオ ストリーム内の場所を取得します。

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: このプロパティは、認識された語句の入力デバイスの生成されたオーディオ ストリーム内の先頭の位置を参照します。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: これに対し、`RecognizerAudioPosition`のプロパティ、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>と<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>クラスは、そのオーディオ入力内の認識エンジンの位置を参照します</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>。

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: これらの位置は別にすることはできます。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: 詳細については、次を参照してください。[音声認識イベントを使用した](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482)です。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>プロパティが認識操作の開始時に、システム時刻を取得します</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 認識されているオーディオの開始時に入力オーディオ ストリーム内の位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 認識されたオーディオ入力オーディオ ストリームの期間を取得します。

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 入力オーディオ ストリーム内で認識されているオーディオの期間です。

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 認識エンジンによって処理されたオーディオの形式を取得します。

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 音声認識エンジンによって処理されるオーディオの形式です。

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: 選択して、認識される現在のセクションのバイナリ データとしてオーディオを返します。

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返されるオーディオ データの開始点です。

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返されるセグメントの長さ。

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by audioPosition and duration.
trans-unit.target: 定義された、認識されているオーディオのサブセクションを返します audioPosition と durationです。

trans-unit.source: audioPosition and duration define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: audioPositionおよびdurationオーディオが現在のセグメントの範囲外のセグメントを定義します。

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: 現在は認識オーディオ データは含まれません。

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 認識操作の開始時に、システム時刻を取得します。

trans-unit.source: The StartTime property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: StartTime プロパティは、待機時間とパフォーマンスの計算のために役立つ認識操作の開始時のシステム時刻を取得します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>プロパティは、入力デバイスの生成されたオーディオ ストリーム内の場所を取得します</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 認識操作の開始時のシステム時刻。

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: 生データとして、全体のオーディオをストリームに書き込みます。

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: オーディオ データを書き込む`outputStream`バイナリ形式にします。

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: ヘッダー情報が含まれていない場合です。

trans-unit.source: The WriteToAudioStream method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: WriteToAudioStream メソッドは、Wave 形式を使用しますが、Wave ヘッダーは含まれません。

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Wave ヘッダーを含めるを使用して、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>メソッド</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: オーディオのデータを受信するストリーム。

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: オーディオを Wave 形式のストリームに書き込みます。

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: オーディオ データを書き込む`outputStream`を Wave 形式でリソース インターチェンジ ファイルの式 (RIFF) ヘッダーが含まれています。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>メソッドは、同じバイナリ形式を使用しますが、Wave ヘッダーは含まれません</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: オーディオのデータを受信するストリーム。
